name: Save the World #olcCodeJam2021
description:
This is my entry for the olcCodeJam2021. It's a platformer where you need to collect coins and restore the world by doing so. There are different type of coins and each of them take you to another world. Can you spot the difference for some of them? You need to restore four world in order to secure safe future for them.

This game uses images/sprites not created by me, but are taken from the links below under the CCO license:

https://opengameart.org/content/seasonal-platformer-tiles

https://opengameart.org/content/rotating-coin
